description: This is a place daily life settles into easily—and feels immediately right. The main level opens to a comfortable living room with gas fireplace, spacious dining area for gathering, and a bright kitchen with quartz counters, generous cabinetry, and direct access to fenced outdoor patio—ideal for everyday meals & weekend BBQs. Upstairs, the primary bedroom is set apart with a full ensuite, joined by two additional bedrooms and a full bath that comfortably support family life or guests. The top level adds flexibility with studio space, a dedicated office that can also serve as a 4th bedroom, and access to a balcony that brings a sense of retreat. Nearly 1,700sqft with exceptional storage, including a large crawlspace. Quiet & private—minutes to Lower Lonsdale conveniences, Quay & Seabus.
